title: Smoked haddock risotto
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '2 sticks celery, chopped', '1 red pepper, seeded and diced', '225g (8 oz) long grain rice', '225g (8 oz) mushrooms, sliced', '600ml (1 pt) vegetable or fish stock', '300ml (1/2 pt) dry white wine', 'salt and pepper to taste', '350g (12 oz) smoked haddock', '170g (5 oz) frozen peas', '2 to 3 tablespoons chopped fresh herbs', 'Parmesan cheese, to sprinkle']
